root.title: japan ex-im bank say new commit brazil
root.body: export-import bank japan presid takashi tanaka told brazil bank continu cooper refrain make commit new credit ex-im offici say 30-minut meet tanaka told brazilian financ minist dilson funaro bank would consid countri request 300 mln dlr credit context intern cooper offici say say meant ex-im bank would grant credit part packag money intern monetari fund privat bank brazil resist go imf help fear fund ask chang econom polici throw recess brazil first request 300 mln dlr credit last novemb help develop sale gener electr power funaro renew request today
